column3: “I've been smoking this strain for about 2 weeks and very happy with my selection. These buds are sticky icky and flavorful. Sweet berries, citrus, pine and a diesely zip. Shes Indica dominate, stony but not foggy with quality Sativa traits. Best used latter in day or evening as shes a little narcotic.”

“This strain is a cross between blackberry and trainwreck and has an earthy berry flavour.  I enjoyed the flavour of this bud, but the high was way too focused for me. I became so focused I cleaned for hours on end, organizing and not able to sit still until all the tasks my mind was creating were complete. I wouldnt smoke this again.”
“I like the flavor. Its got strong flowery berry taste and I also get the strong diesel finish. For me the high is positive and heady with a good couch lock narcotic buzz to compliment.”

“If I could rename this strain I would call it Grape Popsicle. It smells exactly like a f***ing grape popsicle. Great heavy indica effects. Smoke hits you hard but quickly eases into full body relaxation.”

“Very good strain for pain relief. I have yet to find anything better. My only gripe is that the pain relief only lasts for 2 to 3 hours, but while it is working I love it. I have a very bad case of sciatica. The burning needles and pins pain sensation makes my single encounter with shingles seem like a paper cut. Imagine taking a red hot knife, stabbing the outer thigh of each leg and slicing upward. Then imagine com...”
“a little goes a long way”
“up in Aberdeen WA. this stuff is only 10$ an 8th and its a good quality for price flower"”"
“This is the best strain I've tried so far for pain relief 😍. If there's anything better let me know! My only criticism is that it only lasts for 2 - 3 hours ☹️”
“Happy, energetic and focused.”
“This is the best strain I've tried so far for pain relief 😍. If there's anything better let me know! My only criticism is that it only lasts for 2 - 3 hours ☹️”
“Tastes like candy with a potent fiery kick. Another fantastic strain by Forbidden Farms.”

“Very good strain for pain relief. I have yet to find anything better. My only gripe is that the pain relief only lasts for 2 to 3 hours, but while it is working I love it. I have a very bad case of sciatica. The burning needles and pins pain sensation makes my single encounter with shingles seem like a paper cut. Imagine taking a red hot knife, stabbing the outer thigh of each leg and slicing upward. Then imagine com...”
“I purchased a half ounce of this and it's the only strain that has managed to still give me a good head buzz after smoking it for weeks.”

“Some Blackberry Wreck crumble this time! This stuff has a seriously sweet taste. I've been dabbing it down on a quarts banger and man does this stuff hit smooth smooth smooth! So tasty mmmmmmm mmmmm. :) If you can every get this stuff in any good concentrate form GET IT! It is a good full body and mind head rushing stony baked strain. lol YUM.”

“Blackberry Trainwreck was something i hadnt heard about at all. Got a couple Z and first thing i was underwhelmed by was the smell. You can tell it has blackberry genes from the smell, and the smell tells you its potent, it is just very bland. The nugs where bright green and orange, conic and very dense, and absolutley caked in trichs. so much so that u would get a pile of keef every time u grind it, and there would ...”
“Very heavy indica which is best for sleep, pain, and nausea for me. Very tasty bud and great euphoric feeling as well.”
“Hands down the best strain I have smoked for anxiety and stress. I instantly felt a positive cloud over top of me. The high was clear and I was able to do other tasks”
“smoked a blunt of this threw on a stand up and melted into my chair. Great for relaxing!”
“very impressive , get on the mind and body easy to stay motivated and happily numb”

“Why is there a piece of reggie gracing the cover of this strain. leafly needs to step its pic game up. i upload clear legit pics all the time with my reviews and in photo gallery and they only show up 40% of the time.”
“Dark, dough-y consistency.  Bitter fore-taste, but pleasant aroma and aftertaste.  Overall high is decent, better than bad, but not premium.”
